pkgmetadata.longdescription: Presence-Only for Marked Point Process // Inspired by Moreira and Gamerman (2022) doi:10.1214/21-AOAS1569, this methodology expands the idea by including Marks in the point process. Using efficient 'C++' code, the estimation is possible and made faster with 'OpenMP' https://www.openmp.org/ enabled computers.
